caption: Table 1: The absolute percentage increase in Pass Rate (PR) across various internal capability evaluation sets after optimization with Baichuan Alignment. The abbreviations of 'IF', 'IP', 'FC', 'KQA' denote the Instruction Follow, Information Processing, Function Call, Knowledge Question Answer, respectively
description: Table 1 shows the absolute percentage increase in the Pass Rate across various internal capability evaluation sets after optimization with Baichuan Alignment.
